member.name: T:Lab1_UnitsShipped.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Lab1_UnitsShipped.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Lab1_UnitsShipped.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Lab1_UnitsShipped.frmAverageUnitsShipped.btnExit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Exits the form once the exit button is clicked

member.name: M:Lab1_UnitsShipped.frmAverageUnitsShipped.btnEnter_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Receives user input, displays on the display label, then adds input to total units. Once the user has entered units for 7 days, average units is calculated and displayed.

member.name: M:Lab1_UnitsShipped.frmAverageUnitsShipped.btnReset_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears clears the units input, units entries and units average. It also sets the days back to 0, average to 0 and units total to 0. The enter button is re-enabled.
